description:
The Jovians send a peace emissary to the Nadesico - Yukina Shiratori, Tsukumo`s younger sister. However, peace is the last thing on her mind - she plans to assassinate Minato, the woman who "corrupted" her brother! With the Nadesico about to arrive back to Earth, how will Nergal and the UEAF react to a Jovian being aboard the ship?
Source: crunchyroll
